entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:32 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:32 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:32 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023
